text: Hey Team! This user is looking for some CSS help setting up their form: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Blog-Website-Page-Publishing/Help-with-multi-column-form-fieldset-width/m-p/267701#M2449>. Any tips or suggestions would be greatly appreciated! Thank you in advance!
Hiya! Can someone point me to a page that talks about how to update a global website footer, please? I'm not having a lot of luck finding it
if you look at your page template, there is probably a module at the bottom with a special icon.  right click on that and click on edit module
